text: Basil J. Watts (15 June 1926"1939 Register", Findmypast â€“ 31 December 2019) was an English World Cup winning rugby league footballer. He was also known by the nickname of "Baz". Watts played in the 1940s, 1950s and 1960s. He played at representative level for Great Britain and England, and at club level for York. ==References== ==Other websites== *Rleague.com - The World of Rugby League Category:1926 births Category:2019 deaths Category:English rugby league players Category:Sportspeople from Yorkshire Category:People from York
title: Basil Watts
